text: Akave (napiye!) Avarkal colvatai(yellam) nir poruttuk kolviraka innum curiyan utippatarku munnum, atu ataivatarku munnum, iravin nerankalilum um'mutaiya iraivanin pukalait tutittut toluviraka melum innum pakalin (iru) munaikalilum ivvare tuti ceytu toluviraka itanal (nanmaikalataintu) nir tirupti peralam
